title: No More support tickets.
body:
Good to know that you can no longer actually submit a support ticket, i tried changing through the different options and just gave the fuck up.

Cheers Rito.

http://image.prntscr.com/image/2ed3875cba4443618279ebb7e71d943c.png

replies.body:
So I had a play around on the ticket creation site, and I'm 99% sure this is a bug.

+ If you select _Game and Features_ > _Feedback_ then the boards notification you screencapped will show up. But if you then try to swap to _General Questions_ or something else after that, the notification stays there.


+ To get rid of the boards notification you have to refresh the page and select only
_Game and Features_ > _General Questions_.

For some reason clicking _Feedback_ will leave that notification there permanently until you refresh the page. I'll bring it up with some of my support contacts and see what they can do. 

In the meantime try using the workaround I explained above, and let me know if it still doesn't work ;)

It's possible that there may be an issue with the support portal, but based on what the picture says, BlitzBot is assuming that you're trying to submit feedback about something League of Legends related. What's the nature of your support request?

Considering that popped up for stuff in several different areas, my assumption is that you can no longer even make proper support tickets and have to submit shit on boards, and considering help and support was being spammed not that long ago, that's just sad.

EDIT: What is the point of having any "support" option that tells you to fuck off to boards?
